title: Wout Van Aert Tests an Extra Wide Front and Rear Disc Ahead of Paris Olympic Time Trial
content:
Is a front disc wheel going to be what makes the difference for Wout van Aert in this year's Olympic time trial?

Read the full article at Wout Van Aert Tests an Extra Wide Front and Rear Disc Ahead of Paris Olympic Time Trial on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
